title: Explaining matter: chemical change. 2nd edition.
brief_description: Explains the process involved in chemical change. Identifies the parts of the atom and explains atomic structure. Discusses atomic bonding, both ionic and covalent. Shows the ability to predict chemical change has permitted the creation of new substances and introduces the relationships between chemical changes and molecular arrangements.
